msContents.summary: The <title xml:lang="ta">Nālu Mantiri Katai</title>, a narrative in Tamil about the adventures of four ministers. See Zvelebil (1995, p. 469).

filiation.p: BnF Indien 412b. BnF Indien 419. GOML D.424-426.

collation.desc: 1 folio = <emph rend="bold">Title page</emph>. No foliation. Verso blank.
54 folios = <emph rend="bold"><title xml:lang="ta">Nālu Mantiri Katai</title></emph>. Tamil foliation 1-51, [52-54].
1 folio = <emph rend="bold">TBC</emph>. No foliation. Blank recto verso.

additions.desc: BnF shelfmark sticker: <quote>INDIEN 419</quote> (<locus facs="1">front cover, recto</locus>).
BnF bequest sticker <quote>DON N° <space type="vacat"/></quote> (<locus facs="1">front cover, recto</locus>).

binding.p: <material>Wood</material> covers apparently fabricated in the BnF.

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequested by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = <title>Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895</title>, no. 1192.

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine (1912). <title>Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens</title>. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See <ref target="http://gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/btv1b10329763p/f78">p. 60, no. 419</ref>.
Rosny, Léon de (1868). <title type="article">La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry</title>. In: <title>Variétés orientales</title> (pp. 177‒224). Paris: Maisonneuve.

Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. (1866-). <title> Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga</title>. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See <ref target="https://gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/btv1b105375868/f207">f. 96r, no. <del>389</del> 419</ref>.
Zvelebil, Kamil V. (1995). <title>Lexicon of Tamil Literature.</title> Leiden [etc.]: Brill.
